com.code.aon.ui.planner
Interface IPlannerCallbackHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
PlannerController, WorkingTimeController
public interface IPlannerCallbackHandler

This interface should be implemented by those classes that needs a feedback with the EventManager class.
